name: Dice Like Hell ! GMTK2022
description:
Dice Like Hell GMTK game jam 2022

Player must battle with force of darkness with power of the cursed dice!

Roll the number on the dice to match the enemy to kill them!

CONTROL -----------------------------

W A S D --- to roll the dice

Match the dice with the symbol of the enemy to able to damage them!

this game is part of GMTK game jam 2022

----------------------------------------

Dice - Roll - Repeat !
